special_days.name: New Year's Day
messages:
Happy New Year, {name}!
Wishing you a year full of happiness, prosperity, and success. May all your dreams come true in 2025!

Happy New Year, {name}!
May the coming year bring you love, laughter, and countless blessings. Let's make it the best one yet!
